mapper.insert: insert into t_user (avatar, description, create_time, email, nickname, password, moto, type, update_time, username, site) values (#{avatar}, #{description}, #{createTime}, #{email}, #{nickname}, #{password}, #{moto}, #{type}, #{updateTime}, #{username}, #{site});
mapper.select: select * from t_user where username = #{username} and password = #{password};
select COUNT(*) from t_user where username = #{username};
